BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: CAPITAL CITY PUBLIC CHARTER SCHOOL INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION'S MISSION IS TO ENABLE A DIVERSE GROUP OF CHILDREN TO MEET HIGH EXPECTATIONS, DEVELOP CREATIVITY, CRITICAL THINKING, PROBLEM-SOLVING SKILLS, AND ACHIEVE A DEEP UNDERSTANDING OF COMPLEX SUBJECTS, WHILE ACQUIRING A LOVE OF LEARNING AND A STRONG SENSE OF COMMUNITY AND CHARACTER.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION'S MISSION IS TO ENABLE A DIVERSE GROUP OF CHILDREN TO MEET HIGH EXPECTATIONS, DEVELOP CREATIVITY, CRITICAL THINKING, PROBLEM SOLVING SKILLS, AND ACHIEVE A DEEP UNDERSTANDING OF COMPLEX SUBJECTS, WHILE ACQUIRING A LOVE OF LEARNING AND A STRONG SENSE OF COMMUNITY AND CHARACTER.
IRS990.Desc: CAPITAL CITY PUBLIC CHARTER SCHOOL PROVIDES PUBLIC EDUCATION TO STUDENTS IN GRADES PREKTHROUGH HIGH SCHOOL IN THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA. CCPCS IMPLEMENTS THE EXPEDITIONARY LEARNING OUTWARD BOUND (ELOB) SCHOOL DESIGN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CCPCS IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES GENERALLY ACCEPTED IN THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA PROVIDE CONSISTENT GUIDANCE FOR THE ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES RECOGNIZED IN AN ENTITY'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND PRESCRIBE A THRESHOLD OF "MORE LIKELY THAN NOT" FOR RECOGNITION OF TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN A TAX RETURN. CCPCS PERFORMED AN EVALUATION OF UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS OF JUNE 30, 2023 AND 2022 AND DETERMINED THAT THERE WERE NO MATTERS THAT WOULD REQUIRE RECOGNITION IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, OR WHICH MAY HAVE ANY EFFECT ON ITS TAX-EXEMPT STATUS. AS OF JUNE 30, 2023, THE STATUTE OF LIMITATIONS FOR FISCAL YEARS 2020 THROUGH 2023 REMAINS OPEN WITH THE U.S. FEDERAL JURISDICTION AND LOCAL JURISDICTIONS IN WHICH CCPCS FILES TAX RETURNS. IT IS CCPCS'S POLICY TO RECOGNIZE INTEREST AND/OR PENALTIES RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS, IF ANY, IN INCOME TAX EXPENSE.
CHANGE IN FAIR VALUE OF INTEREST RATE SWAP
AS A PUBLIC CHARTER SCHOOL, DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA LAW REQUIRES CCPCS TO BE RACIALLY NONDISCRIMINATORY. THIS POLICY WAS MADE CLEAR THROUGH BROCHURES AND PUBLIC MEETINGS.
CAPITAL CITY PUBLIC CHARTER SCHOOL RECEIVES FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE FROM BOTH THE FEDERAL AND DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA GOVERNMENTS.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: CURRENT REFUNDING OF BONDS TO RENOVATE SCHOOL BUILDING

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FINANCE COMMITTEE GETS A DRAFT COPY OF THE 990 FORM TO REVIEW. EDITS OR CLARIFICATIONS ARE SHARED WITH THE AUDITOR PREPARING THE FORM. THE 990 IS PRESENTED TO THE FULL BOARD BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE CHAIRPERSON.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH CONTRACT OF $25K OR MORE APPROVED BY BOARD ALSO VERIFIED NO BOARD OR KEY STAFF CONFLICTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION OF THE ORGANIZATION'S HEAD OF SCHOOL IS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THESE DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST. ALSO, MANY OF THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE FROM THE DC PUBLIC CHARTER SCHOOL BOARD.
CHANGE IN FAIR VALUE OF INTEREST RATE SWAP 439,545.
PROCESS HAS NOT CHNAGED SINCE LAST YEAR.
